abstract: Three-month-old Karl Towndrow dies at unlicensed day care in Manhattan; cause of death is being investigated.
lead_paragraph: Caretakers called the police when they were unable to wake the 3-month-old boy, Karl Towndrow, after he had been fed a bottle of breast milk and put down for a nap.

headline.main: Infant at Unlicensed Day Care Is Taken to a Hospital and Dies
headline.print_headline: Infant at Unlicensed Day Care Is Taken to a Hospital and Dies

snippet: Caretakers called the police when they were unable to wake the 3-month-old boy, Karl Towndrow, after he had been fed a bottle of breast milk and put down for a nap.

keywords.value: Office of Children and Family Services (NYS)
